about_the_game:
This Free DLC contains the module (dnm), NSF and MP3 files for Sees Game.
The module file is compatible with Dn-Famitracker 0.4.0.1 and higher.

DLC won't affect the game in any manner, it will download a folder in the game's local files.


Look for the folder "Sees Game Soundtrack".
detailed_description:
This Free DLC contains the module (dnm), NSF and MP3 files for Sees Game.
The module file is compatible with Dn-Famitracker 0.4.0.1 and higher.

DLC won't affect the game in any manner, it will download a folder in the game's local files.


Look for the folder "Sees Game Soundtrack".
name: Sees Game Sountrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 2000
  • Processor: Yes
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: None, it's just music
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Of course
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: I mean, yea
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Very amazing graphic card that transforms music to graphics for literally no reason.
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If you got one of those sound systems that goes around the room, that'd be awesome
  • Additional Notes: Seriously, these are just music files.

short_description: This Free DLC contains the module (dnm), NSF and MP3 files for Sees Game.
